if (existing.get('cmdb_ci_class', current.cmdb_ci_class)) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("There is already a category for this CI class")); current.setAbortAction(true); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-06-15 21:32:20</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>33fb43cf1b62200050fdfbcd2c07139d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Protect cmdb_ci_class on insert</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Model Management" source="com.snc.model">1d64b8e83c31311068bcf327dfe37f3a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_33fb43cf1b62200050fdfbcd2c07139d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2012-06-15 22:15:12</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=33fb43cf1b62200050fdfbcd2c07139d"/> </record_update>
